artefact.licence_overview: To transport animals on journeys of over eight hours, you need authorisation from the [Scottish Government Rural Payments and Inspections Directorate.](http://www.sears.scotland.gov.uk/AgencyView.aspx?Agency=SGRPID "Scottish Government Rural Payments and Inspections Directorate"){:rel="external"}
